MODULE.name: VOICE_MODULE_RX_AIG
MODULE.description:
Adaptive input gain control algorithm in the voice preprocessor voice#[ #] preprocessor on the Rx path.
This module supports the following parameter IDs:
VOICE_PARAM_MOD_ENABLE
VOICE_PARAM_AIG

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Enable
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Enables/disables this feature

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Reserved
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Client should set this field to zero.

PARAMETER.name: VOICE_PARAM_AIG
PARAMETER.description:
Adaptive Input Gain (AIG) algorithm on the Tx and Rx paths.
Fixed size for#[ #] this parameter 
Version 0 â€“ 36 bytes

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: aigMode
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Mode control to apply SIG#[ #] or AIG. Enable also has to be set to enable AIG

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: staticGainL16Q12
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Static#[ #] input gain when aigMode is set to 0: Q3.12, 0 dB = 0x1000, staticGainL16Q12 = dec2hex(round(10^(staticGaindB /20) * 4096))

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: initialGainDBL16Q7
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Initial#[ #] value that the adaptive gain update starts from: dB Q7, 0 dB = 0x0000, initialGainDBL16Q7 = dec2hex(round(initialGaindB *128))

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: idealRMSDBL16Q7
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Average RMS#[ #] level that AIG attempts to achieve: Q8.7, -24 dB = 0x2128, idealRMSDBL16Q7 = dec2hex(round(( idealRMSdB + 300 * log10(2)) *128))

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: noiseGateL32
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Threshold#[ #] below which signal is considered as noise and AIG targets for an idealRmsDB of 0 dB: -60 dB = 0x00000432, noiseGateL32 = dec2hex(round(10^(#[ #] (noiseGatedB + 300*log10(2)) /10)))

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: minGainL32Q15
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Minimum#[ #] gain that can be provided by AIG: Q16.15, 0 dB = 0x00008000, minGainL32Q15 = dec2hex(round(10^(minGaindB/20)* 32768))

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: maxGainL32Q15
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Maximum#[ #] gain that can be provided by AIG: Q16.15, 0 dB = 0x00008000, maxGainL32Q15 = dec2hex(round(10^(maxGaindB/20)* 32768))

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: gainAtRtUL32Q31
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Attack/release time for AIG update: Q1.31, 5000 ms = 0x0001CD5C at 8 kHz, 10000 ms = 0x0000E6AF at 8kHz,#[ #] gainAtRtUL32Q31 = dec2hex(round((1-exp(-2200 /fs/gainAtRtms))*2^31))

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: longGainAtRtUL32Q31
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Long attack/release time while updating gain for noise/silence: Q1.31, 100000 ms = 0x00001712 at 8 kHz,#[ #] longGainAtRtUL32Q31 = dec2hex(round((1-exp(-2200 /fs/longGainAtRtms)) * 2^31))

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: rmsTavUL32Q32
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: RMS smoothing time constant used for long-term RMS estimate: Q0.32, 5000ms = 0x0039AB9 at 8 kHz, rmsTavUL16Q16 =#[ #] dec2hex(round((1-exp(-2200/fs/rmsTavms)) *2^32))

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: gainUpdateStartTimMsUL32Q0
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: The waiting time before which AIG starts to apply adaptive gain update: Q32.0, 1000 ms = 0x00003E8,#[ #] gainUpdateStartTimeMsUL32Q0 = round(gainUpdateStartTimems)
